value.title: Artificial intelligence at the service of talent selection
value.excerpt: They present Hitch, the startup that through artificial intelligence and machine learning helps companies find the talent most compatible with their organizational culture.

value.title: Digital Trends 2021: Responsible Business Puts Trust, Ethics, And Sustainability First
value.excerpt: This year’s digital technology predictions from industry analysts reveal trending people-centric exigencies for brand trust, ethical responsibility, and sustainability.

value.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 mobile review: The fastest laptop GPU just arrived

value.title: Designing An Electric Or Autonomous Vehicle Is Like Designing A Smartphone
value.excerpt: Smartphones require the latest technology to increase device functionality and to improve system efficiency to prolong battery life. EVs and AVs face similar challenges.

value.title: Trinamix unveils 3D imaging to stop facial-recognition theft on smartphones
value.excerpt: Trinamix is introducing a 3D imaging solution that helps prevent fraud when someone tries to log into a system using facial recognition.

value.title: Aeva to supply lidar sensors to self-driving truck firm TuSimple
value.excerpt: Aeva Inc, a firm founded by former Apple Inc engineers to supply a key self-driving car sensor, said on Tuesday it had reached a deal to supply the sensors for self-driving heavy duty trucks being developed by TuSimple.

value.title: Amazon is adding 3,000 jobs in Boston, including in AI, finance, and HR, as it continues its pandemic hiring spree
value.excerpt: Amazon is adding the new roles at its Boston Tech Hub and a 17-story office building in Seaport it's just leased.

value.title: This AI Could Go From ‘Art’ to Steering a Self-Driving Car
value.excerpt: DALL-E drew laughs for creating images of a daikon radish in a tutu. But it builds on an important advance in computer vision with serious applications.

value.title: How Facial Recognition Algorithms Can Cut Out Bias
value.excerpt: A team has published the results of a study that evaluates the accuracy and bias in gender and skin colour of automatic face recognition algorithms tested with real world data.

value.title: How AI and ML will impact insurers' ROI reserves in 2021 and beyond
value.excerpt: Here's how emerging technologies can allow insurers to conduct proactive analyses to aid in the claims process.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence In Drug Discovery Market Key Players: IBM Watson, Exscientia, GNS Healthcare, Benevolent AI

value.title: Kao Data to Host InstaDeep's HPC and AI Supercomputer, Expanding R&D Capabilities
value.excerpt: Kao Data, the specialist developer and operator of advanced, carrier-neutral data centres for high performance colocation, has today announced a new customer contract with InstaDeep, a global leader in artificial intelligence (AI) powered decision-making solutions for enterprise.

value.title: Graphcore debuts its 'Graphcloud' AI cloud service in association with Cirrascale
value.excerpt: Graphcore has teamed up with Cirrascale to launch its new AI Cloud Service dubbed 'Graphcloud'. It will combine Graphcore's own IPU-POD systems with Cirrascale's cloud service infrastruture.

value.title: AI helps this Koda social robot dog sense human emotions
value.excerpt: This AI robot dog not only climbs stairs but also interacts socially with its human owners. Man's best friend has always been the domesticated dog, but mutts around the world could end up with some serious competition in the form of Koda's AI-powered robot dog .

value.title: South Korea has used AI to bring a dead superstar's voice back to the stage, but ethical concerns abound
value.excerpt: Recent AI performances have excited fans of their music and the technology, but others have raised concerns about the ethics and legalities of resurrecting the voices of the dead.

value.title: How AI can make the world more fair for ‘gifted’ kids
value.excerpt: A team of researchers from Las Vegas recently developed an AI model capable of judging a human pianist’s skill level. On the surface, it might not sound like the kind of breakthrough research that could change the world overnight.

value.title: Governance: Companies mature in their use of AI know that it needs guardrails
value.excerpt: Quality governance ensures responsible data models and AI execution, as well as helps the data models stay true to the business objectives.

value.title: Researchers propose LEAF, a frontend for developing AI classification algorithms
value.excerpt: Researchers at Google propose LEAF, a frontend that provides superior audio classification results compared with previous techniques.

value.title: Gartner: The future of AI is not as rosy as some might think
value.excerpt: A Gartner report predicts that the second-order consequences of widespread AI will have massive societal impacts, to the point of making us unsure if and when we can trust our own eyes.

value.title: Learning with — and about — AI technology
value.excerpt: MIT Media Lab Personal Robots group head Cynthia Breazeal joined MIT Education Arcade Director Eric Klopfer for a conversation about AI's role in K-12 education as part of a new webinar series from MIT Open Learning.

value.title: Computer vision researchers develop city-scale smart tracking platform
value.excerpt: Tracking a vehicle or person moving between multiple city-scale locations will become considerably easier thanks to AI camera innovations.

value.excerpt: According to Gartner, 58% of marketing leaders believe brand is a critical driver of buyer behavior for prospects, and 65% believe it’s a critical driver of buyer behavior for existing customers.
